# 1883 Chicago White Stockings season

| league_place = 2nd
| owner = Albert Spalding
| manager = Cap Anson
| television =
| radio =
|}}
The 1883 Chicago White Stockings season was the 12th season of the Chicago White Stockings franchise, the eighth in the National League and the sixth at Lakefront Park. The White Stockings finished second in the National League with a record of 59â€“39.
